mapper.select: select * from ( (SELECT r.title ,r.id,r.create_date as date ,r.create_by as authorId,"resource" as type FROM resource r ORDER BY r.top_num limit 2) UNION All (SELECT b.title ,b.id,b.create_date as date ,b.create_by as authorId, "blogger" as type FROM blogger b ORDER BY b.top_num limit 2) UNION All (SELECT n.title ,n.id,n.create_date as date ,n.create_by as authorId, "note" as type FROM note n ORDER BY n.top_num limit 2) ) as Common

select * from ( (SELECT r.title ,r.id,r.create_date as date ,r.create_by as authorId,"resource" as type FROM resource r ORDER BY r.read_num limit 2) UNION All (SELECT b.title ,b.id,b.create_date as date ,b.create_by as authorId, "blogger" as type FROM blogger b ORDER BY b.read_num limit 2) UNION All (SELECT n.title ,n.id,n.create_date as date ,n.create_by as authorId, "note" as type FROM note n ORDER BY n.read_num limit 2) ) as Common
